content: प्रास्ताविक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Serving as an introduction, introductory, prefatory; as in प्रास्ताविकविलास (the first or introductory part of <ls>Bhāminīvilāsa</ls>); प्रास्ताविकं वचनं ‘prefatory remarks.’ {@--2@} Seasonable, opportune, timely. {@--3@} Pertinent, relevant (to the matter in hand); अप्रास्ताविकी महत्येषा कथा <ls>Māl. 2.</ls>
